attributes.action: Stop the government putting illegal immigrants first over its UK citizens.
attributes.additional_details: Start looking after its UK citizens. We don’t feel safe anymore. You are letting illegal immigrants walk around this country freely without any backgrounds on them. Start using the money wasted in illegal immigrants on more pressing issues like saving the NHS, reducing inflation.  Stop the boats.
attributes.background: Stop paying for Illegal immigrants. Stop the benefits, stop allowing people (mostly men) crossing in small boats. Depot illegal immigrants immediately. Stop paying out 6 million a day on just housing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640388
